name: Kansas City Community Gardens (KCCG)
category: Armenian-speaking Community garden management in Kansas
description: KCCG is a non-profit membership organization that helps people grow vegetables and fruit from garden plots and orchards. They offer low-cost seeds, plants, educational workshops, and technical assistance
services: Armenian-speaking Community garden management in Kansas consultation

name: The Giving Grove
category: Armenian-speaking Community garden management in Kansas
description: This nonprofit works with residents of under-resourced communities to grow orchards, aiming to address environmental issues, food access, and community connection. They are expanding their educational materials to be available in multiple languages
services: Armenian-speaking Community garden management in Kansas consultation

name: Cultivate Kansas City
category: Armenian-speaking Community garden management in Kansas
description: Cultivate Kansas City is a non-profit group that advocates for local food producers and urban agriculture. They focus on addressing issues like vacant lots, climate change, and disconnection from food
services: Armenian-speaking Community garden management in Kansas consultation

name: New Roots (a partnership between Catholic Charities of Northeast Kansas and Cultivate KC)
address: Juniper Gardens Training Farm, Kansas City, Kansas
category: Armenian-speaking Community garden management in Kansas
description: This program supports farmers, particularly refugees, in graduating from a four-year farmer training program. They help participants learn to grow in the Midwestern climate, run a business in the US, and connect with sales outlets, offering English classes as needed
services: Armenian-speaking Community garden management in Kansas consultation

name: Kansas City Urban Farm Co-op
category: Armenian-speaking Community garden management in Kansas
description: Founded in 2016, this cooperative aims to build a locally-owned, member-operated economic engine fueled by sustainable urban agriculture. They are also involved in a "100 Gardens Challenge."
services: Armenian-speaking Community garden management in Kansas consultation

name: Manheim Gardens
category: Armenian-speaking Community garden management in Kansas
description: An inclusive community garden and green space that provides growing space, free produce, community events, and educational activities. It is a 100% volunteer-run nonprofit organization
services: Armenian-speaking Community garden management in Kansas consultation

name: KU Community Garden
category: Armenian-speaking Community garden management in Kansas
description: This garden provides space for students, faculty, staff, and community members to learn about and experiment with growing their own food, supporting local food systems and encouraging a connection with the earth
services: Armenian-speaking Community garden management in Kansas consultation

name: Greenleaf Garden Services

description: Greenleaf Garden Services offers landscaping and gardening services, including landscape design, installation, and maintenance, as well as vegetable gardens

name: Rooted Landscape
category: Armenian-speaking Community garden management in Kansas

name: Rosehill Gardens
